body_html: So basically the aptitude here is to ignore windows users right ? I get it, 'we should be using Linux if we want to use Tensorflow' . I understand the latest releases would be on Linux first, but its insulting to suggest that Windows users should not make requests for robust and clear Tensorflow 1.5 and Keras support on Windows ad Python 3.6. I mean its only been like a year or so.

body: So basically the aptitude here is to ignore windows users right ? I get it, 'we should be using Linux if we want to use Tensorflow' . I understand the latest releases  would be on Linux first, but its insulting to suggest that Windows users should not make requests for robust and clear Tensorflow 1.5 and Keras support on Windows ad Python 3.6.   I mean its only been like a year or so.
